title: Let her be
content: There is a stupid phrase, if you love something, Let it go right? Well, you usually lie to yourself, Bala..Line to not cross..cmon dude! It's the most self righteous lie. It makes me feel noble..sure. Its helps the idea of how I love.. Sure. It sucks, no one to call after a bad day, Truth, you let her be... For you still love her. Only then will you be this irrational...as letting someone go.. Life happens. I say this without pride or prejudice, Honestly. Best explanation, I can figure out for me. REM: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1aVHLL5egRY
contentWithMarkup:
There is a stupid phrase, if you love something,
Let it go right?

Well, you usually lie to yourself,
Bala..Line to not cross..cmon dude!

It's the most self righteous lie.
It makes me feel noble..sure.
Its helps the idea of how I love..
Sure.

It sucks, no one to call after a bad day,
Truth, you let her be...

For you still love her.
Only then will you be this irrational...as letting someone go..

Life happens.

I say this without pride or prejudice,
Honestly.
Best explanation, I can figure out for me.
